name: serverless-plugin-splunk
description: Serverless plugin for adding a function to send logs from Cloudwatch to Splunk and attach it to the log groups for every other function in the package

scripts.postinstall: mkdir splunk; cd splunk; git init; git remote add -f origin https://github.com/splunk/splunk-aws-serverless-apps.git; git config core.sparseCheckout true; echo "splunk-cloudwatch-logs-processor" >> .git/info/sparse-checkout; git pull --depth=1 origin master;

author: The Black Tux
